title: Google enables WebGPU by default in Chrome 121
description:
Google has enabled WebGPU support by default in the latest version of its Chrome browser, Chrome 121. WebGPU is a new web standard that provides low-level access to GPU hardware for high-performance 3D graphics and general purpose computing using JavaScript APIs.  WebGPU support is now enabled on devices running Android 12 or later powered by... Read more »

The post Google enables WebGPU by default in Chrome 121 appeared first on Developer Tech News.
